verses.hausa: Ina rantsuwa da dawãki mãsu gudu suna fitar da kũkan ciki.

verses.english: And the producers of sparks [when] striking
verses.hausa: Mãsu ƙyasta wuta (da kõfatansu a kan duwatsu) ƙyastawa.
Sa'an nan mãsu yin hari a lokacin asuba.
Sai su motsar da ƙũra game da shi.

verses.english: Arriving thereby in the center collectively,
verses.hausa: Sai su shiga, game da ita (ƙũrar), a tsakãnin jama'ar maƙiya.

verses.english: Indeed mankind, to his Lord, is ungrateful.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne mutum mai tsananin butulci ne ga Ubangijinsa.

verses.english: And indeed, he is to that a witness.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne shi mai shaida ne a kan laifinsa dl haka.

verses.english: And indeed he is, in love of wealth, intense.
verses.hausa: Kuma 1alle ne ga dũkiya shi mai tsananin so ne.

verses.arabic: أَفَلَا يَعْلَمُ إِذَا بُعْثِرَ مَا فِى ٱلْقُبُورِ
verses.english: But does he not know that when the contents of the graves are scattered
verses.hausa: Shin, bã ya da sanin lõkacin da aka tõne abin da yake cikin kaburbura.

verses.english: And that within the breasts is obtained,
verses.hausa: Aka bayyana abin da ke cikin zukata.

verses.english: Indeed, their Lord with them, that Day, is [fully] Acquainted.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne Ubangijinsu, game da su a ranar nan Mai ƙididdigewa ne?
